skill_claims: Create new PDF documents from scratch
Merge multiple PDF files into one
Split PDF files into separate pages
Handle PDF forms and form filling

tasks.prompt: I have a PDF report and need to get all the text out of it so I can copy it into an email. Can you help me extract the text?
I need to create a simple PDF with just a title and a few paragraphs of text for a basic company memo.
tasks.tests_claim: Create new PDF documents from scratch

tasks.prompt: I have three separate PDF files that I need to combine into one document. How can I merge them together?
tasks.tests_claim: Merge multiple PDF files into one

tasks.prompt: I have a financial report PDF with several data tables that I need to convert to Excel for analysis. Can you help me extract the tables?
I need to take a 50-page PDF manual and split it so each chapter becomes its own separate PDF file. Each chapter is about 5-8 pages.
tasks.tests_claim: Split PDF files into separate pages

tasks.prompt: I have some confidential documents that I need to password protect before sending to clients. How can I add password protection to my PDFs?
I have a bunch of scanned invoices that are just images in PDF format. I need to extract all the text from them to build a database of invoice data.
I need to create a multi-page PDF report with our company logo as a watermark on every page, plus extract all the images from an existing PDF to use in the new document.
I have a PDF form that needs to be filled out with data from a CSV file - about 200 records. I need to programmatically fill the form fields and generate individual PDFs for each record.
tasks.tests_claim: Handle PDF forms and form filling

quality_prompts: I need to extract data tables from a PDF financial report and convert them to Excel format for analysis.
Help me merge 5 different PDF contracts into one master document while preserving all formatting.
I have a 100-page PDF that needs to be split into individual chapters, with each chapter being 8-12 pages.
Create a professional PDF invoice template with our company logo and customer information fields.
I need to add password protection to sensitive PDF documents before sharing them with external partners.
